Description: Handle of Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Rectangular stamp
Curator's comments: Only known from Petrie's drawing in his Journal, 1884-5, p.31, 12. A month name is not found with the fabricant Glaukias, nor Diokleia; Simias does use month names, but the confusion of M and K would be odd.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0670)
